question: Who among the following was the author ofÂ Sugreeva Vijayam?
explanation:
The third ruler of Qutub Shahi dynasty, Ibrahim (1550-80) patronage many Telugu poets like
  • Addanki Gangadhram- Tapati Samvaronopakyanam
  • Kandukuri Rudra Kavi- Sugreeva Vijayam
  • Malla Reddi- Sivadharmottaram
  • Ponnakanti Teleanganayya- Yayati Charitra
